author: Andy Cole
comment: Seems ok at first use, but when using the stopwatch the numbers aren't a fixed width so the display wibbles about when a 1 is displayed. That's a pretty basic thing to get wrong and is really annoying.  It would be nice to set the ambient brightness also. And be able to turn off the indicators

author: ajay chauhan
comment: I have a tag connected. Cant understand how to view fitness, steps, HR,.. and why there is a menu and prev and next buttons when they do nothing.

author: Dave Singer
comment: Great watchface. I love the look and functionality Only thing stopping a 5 star review is that the digital second time display won't hold a timezone and keeps reverting to local time

author: Clifford Snow
comment: Can't recommend for ZenWatch 2. The guard watch face menu doesn't appear. If its a configuration setting, it's not obvious.

author: Doug Lail
comment: Works great on moto360. Had an issue with the weather. Was related to another app hijacking weather queries. Fixed now. I have multiple faces by this company and all of them are in my rotation.

author: Rob Mills
comment: ZenWatch 2 Weather was wrong.  No integration with fitness other than Google.  Interactive are not customizable with normal watch functions timer, stopwatch, watch battery, waste of my money.
Like the face but until it allows you to select other apps and not just google apps it's pretty but useless

author: John Walthers
comment: This is the only watchface that truly disappointed me! I bought the premium and know all of the troubleshooting methods for Richface watchface's. This one is not interactive and the "next" and "prev" buttons did not function. I really would like a refund for this watchface.

author: Rajeev Gupta
comment: Everytime the time zone I set for digital clock goes away by itself and I have to reset it. Very irritating

author: Rajeev Sharma
comment: I am not able to adjust digital time to another time zone. After selection , time remain same on watch.

author: Mick Delaney
comment: Paid for the premium version and worked flawlessly on my lg watch urbane and galaxy s7. However will not work on my note 8 paired with my lg watch urbane please fix and will give 5 stars again

author: MACPITBULL Brent
comment: No functionality on fossil watch. Can't scroll to fit data or any other functions.

author: Cyrille Aggery
comment: I absolutely hate the noisy promotion reminders. Uninstalling

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

You can disable it. In description you have note  that we send one a month...

Regards

author: Donald Knight
comment: Can't get Ambient mode to work at all on my watch.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please send us a screenshot of your watch in ambient mode.

author: Rene Alvarez
comment: The temperature and battery smarth phone never update and menu should have more app's or device app please fix thank you.

author: jamie fyffe
comment: Will someone please tell me what I payed a premium. For as nothing opens and not a good program I'll be asking for z refund

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you enabled premium option in companion app settings?

author: Jeff Seale
comment: Nice watch face. Still need to be able to change the color of the battery level bars. More app shortcut options would be nice too.

author: Kamran Akhter
comment: Doesn't work with the watch face on the watch.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what exactly doesn't work for you?

author: peter Van Beuren
comment: Does not connect to my Samsung gear 2

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: It is design for Android Wear smartwatches only. Read description first!

author: Tim Beach
comment: Sony 3 nothing works on it other than the time.

author: Stephen Lyons
comment: Can't get it to load onto watch

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: You need to download it from watch.

author: melvin banegas
comment: We're is my f wach

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you installed a watchface from Google play store located on your watch?

author: Jason Ivancic
comment: Awesome watch face buy can't seem to set weather

author: Vincent Sartoris
comment: My go to watch
The fitness steps don't record or do anything

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Have you connected to Google fit via companion app?

author: Billy Catubay
comment: Security,and elegant

author: Shu Zhang
comment: The second timezone settings are never saved when I switch to other face and switch back, or reboot the watch. Fix it please. It's been a very long time since I submit this review. I have to give it only one star for this until it fixed.

author: Ernest Bowie
comment: Cant get the flashlight shortcut to work and would be nice if there were a way to disable the hour and minute hands on the (non-full) ambient screen. Otherwise great looking watchface for square watches..

author: shachar tal
comment: Excellent look and functionality. Looses some settings when offline and when transitioning between watchfaces e.g. the timezone reverts to local time.

author: Andrew Van Winkle
comment: It crashes as soon as it gets set as my watch face. I have premium, and I tried setting the settings to default. I have a Moto 360 sport.

author: John Chan
comment: For Dual Time display, this one in my opinion is the best! But it does not save the second time zone.  Every time reload this watch face, you need to go through Google Play Store.  The version before the update I rated higher.  If the developer does not listen to the users,  I will not recommend this watch face.  It is not worth the agony.

author: Joan Weston
comment: How do I change the top display to a date instead of Google Fit Step Count?  Love the look but can't figure out the shortcuts and no obvious contact

author: Leon Fowler
comment: Anyone using this I made it work by switching to another watch face Infinity then switching back I don't understand what happened   Not sure am I missing something I use other ones of your faces but I cannot get to the shortcuts such as Steps flashlight find my phone, plus my weather isn't updating either and the screen won't lock. Premium Lg watch sport

author: Oladosu Oriyomi
comment: Can some put me though how to set up this app and make use of it

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you connected your watch with phone device?

author: Devansh Vyas
comment: Ridiculous app. Even to use the dual time function asks for money. What is the use of such useless app.

author: Joseph R. Grimmett
comment: I really like the look of this face, I did have an issue with it when I purchased the pro version, but after restarting the watch it works great, definitely one of my favs

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you enables an premium option in the companion app?

author: Keith Bell
comment: Decent dual display watch face. Various options and colours in the purchased version.

author: Wootton IT
comment: 1st watch face I have purchased, after testing many.

comment: You stated that the weather forecast is with graph. How do I set it to graph?
